item.title: Insurance fraud analytics
item.description: An overview of published and ongoing research papers within the insurance fraud research line developed in my lab. Fraud detection in insurance with social network analytics Collaborators: María Óskarsdóttir, Katrien Antonio, Bart Baesens and Tom Reynkens, research in the framework of the Ageas CE Research Chair. Presentations: EAJ Leuven 2018, Cass & KU Leuven symposium 2019, Insurance Data Science 2019 (ETH), IME Munchen 2019. Abstract.
